name: Friday Night Funkin' Unity
description:
FRIDAY NIGHT FUNKIN' UNITY (ALPHA)

Friday Night Funkin' recreated in Unity with many additions and improvements.

Includes Week 7

Includes Expert and Insane difficulties for weeks 1-6

Includes weeks Hatsune Miku ( More to )

Local co-op mode

Play as Boyfriend, CPU or both?

Harder than the original game

Song speed changer ( Speed them up for an extra challenge or slow them down for practice )

Week progression

Streak based scoring

NOTE

Not a 1:1 recreation.

Please comment with any suggestions and bugs.

Hatsune Miku Week: Friday Night Funkin' + Hatsune Miku / FULL WEEK

Song Chart Fix: Song Chart Fix

VISIT SETTINGS FIRST
